_comment: Central manifest tracking published versions of all modules. Use SemVer: MAJOR=breaking, MINOR=feature, PATCH=fix.

Microsoft.ContainerRegistry/registries/c.notes: Initial release - Azure Container Registry with Premium defaults and zone redundancy

Microsoft.Web/serverfarms/app-service-pl.notes: Initial release - Azure App Service Plan with zone redundancy support

Microsoft.Web/sites/web-app.notes: Initial release - Azure Web App / Function App with secure defaults

Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/key-vault.notes: Initial release - Azure Key Vault with Premium SKU, RBAC authorization, and secure defaults
